item.title: Five Dunder Methods in Python you should know about
item.description: In my last post, I talked about Object-Oriented Programming(OOP). And I specifically talked about a single magic method __init__ which is also called as a constructor method in the OOP terminology.

item.title: Use Iterators, Generators, and Generator Expressions
item.description: Python in many ways has made our life easier when it comes to programming.

item.title: Object Oriented Programming Explained Simply for Data Scientists
item.description: Object-Oriented Programming or OOP can be a tough concept to understand for beginners.

item.title: Understanding Transformers, the Programming Way
item.description: Transformers have become the defacto standard for NLP tasks nowadays. They started being used in NLP but they are now being used in Computer Vision and sometimes to generate music as well.
